entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
